contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. By this Order, this Court does not embrace the Commonwealth Court’s view that this action sounds in mandamus or that a six-month statute of limitations applies to actions in mandamus in this context.
Chief Justice CASTILLE files a Concurring Statement in which Justice EAKIN joins.
